entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 40.
